infotext:
The application has been developed by the Finnish Museum of Natural History Luomus in the project Flying Squirrel LIFE which is coordinated by Mets√§hallitus Parks & Wildlife Finland. The EU-funded project aims to improve conservation of the flying squirrel in the EU by improving viable habitat networks in the future.

The project has received funding from the LIFE Programme of the European Union. The material reflects the views by the authors, and the European Commission or the EASME is not responsible for any use that may be made of the information it contains.
